message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling this product to you. I know you'll find immense value in it.  To start, I'm proposing a price of $1,400,000.  Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can reach a fairer agreement. I am willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate you coming back with an offer.  I understand your perspective, however, my valuation of the product is significantly higher. I could consider letting it go for $1,350,000.  This is a fair offer considering the value it brings.
I see your point, Alice. Thank you for adjusting your offer. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to pay $1,300,000 for it.
